verses.name: Mark 10:5
verses.text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.

verses.name: Mark 10:6
verses.text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female.

verses.name: Mark 10:7
verses.text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;

verses.name: Mark 10:8
verses.text: And they twain shall be one flesh: so then they are no more twain, but one flesh.

verses.name: Mark 10:9
verses.text: What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.

verses.name: Mark 10:10
verses.text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter.
